content.html: Yesterday I asked an interviewer why they do live coding interviews. They responded, “to make sure you know how to program.” I wonder at what point faking programming for nearly 2 decades has ever happened
content.value:
Yesterday I asked an interviewer why they do live coding interviews.

They responded, “to make sure you know how to program.”

I wonder at what point faking programming for nearly 2 decades has ever happened
